mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audio.rule_log (ip_addr, time, content, member_id, top_level_id, top_level_name, middle_level_id, middle_level_name, bottom_level_id, bottom_level_name, library_file_name, class_package, using_log_no) VALUES(#{ip_addr}, #{time}, #{content}, #{member_id}, #{top_level_id}, #{top_level_name}, #{middle_level_id}, #{middle_level_name}, #{bottom_level_id}, #{bottom_level_name}, #{library_file_name}, #{class_package}, #{using_log_no});

INSERT INTO audio.rule_log_detail (content, top_level_id, top_level_name, middle_level_id, middle_level_name, bottom_level_id, bottom_level_name, using_log_no) VALUES(#{content}, #{top_level_id}, #{top_level_name}, #{middle_level_id}, #{middle_level_name}, #{bottom_level_id}, #{bottom_level_name}, #{using_log_no});
mapper.select: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS row_num, no, ip_addr, time, content, member_id, top_level_id, middle_level_id, bottom_level_id, top_level_name, middle_level_name, bottom_level_name, library_file_name, class_package, using_log_no FROM (SELECT * FROM audio.rule_log WHERE top_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR middle_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR bottom_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR library_file_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR class_package LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' ORDER BY time DESC) temp LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS row_num, no, ip_addr, time, content, member_id, top_level_id, middle_level_id, bottom_level_id, top_level_name, middle_level_name, bottom_level_name, library_file_name, class_package, using_log_no FROM (SELECT * FROM audio.rule_log WHERE using_log_no = #{using_log_no} AND (top_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR middle_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR bottom_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR library_file_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR class_package LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%') ORDER BY time DESC) temp LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

WHERE top_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR middle_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR bottom_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR library_file_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR class_package LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%'
